name: Brandy Sangaree
preparation:
Dating back to the late 1700s, this single-serving punch is the perfect open-ended drink. At its simplest, it’s sweet, spicy and low on alcohol. But add a shot of your favorite brandy, and things get even more interesting.

Add the sugar and water into a mixing glass and stir until sugar is dissolved.

Add the brandy, port wine and ice and stir.

Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
